attributes.action: Declare a national NHS day every year so we can show our appreciation.
attributes.additional_details: Given how the NHS are working very hard to combat covid19 and putting their lives at risk to defeat this virus and how hard they work during 'normal' times it's about time as a nation we showed our support and gratitude as a nation!
attributes.background: The government should declare a National NHS day for people to show their support to our wonderful NHS, just like how we have Armed Forces day.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
